tasks.title: Tracking your Live Activity with Braze

inlineContent.text: This section dives into the interface methods Braze provides to track and manage your Live Activities.
In this section, we demonstrate how to resume Live Activity tracking upon app launch. This allows Braze to resume tracking push token updates for all active Live Activities.
